summary: Followers and NPCs based off users of OT Thunder Dome
descriptionHtml:
Adds the following NPCs:

[b]Followers[/b]: 
[list]
[*]BJ Smith - Barbarian in Jorrvaskr
[*]Red Epoch - Warrior in The Bannered Mare
[*]Oaky - Warrior in Castle Dour
[*]Spinny - Paladin in Windpeak Inn
[*]Flade - Monk in Silverblood Inn
[*]Tyson - Battlemage in The Frozen Hearth
[*]Mac B - Witchblade in Old Hroldan Inn
[*]Stalin - Spymaster in The Ragged Flagon
[*]Ugly - Warrior in Palace of the Kings
[/list]
[b]Enemies[/b]
[list]
[*]Flamingdinner - Dragon acolyte in Forelhost, sole keeper of the Conjure Charles Wingate spell tome
[*]Flamdini Supreme - Flamingdinner as a warlock, can be summoned on defeat
[*]Sharon Starkey - Wise woman of Serpents Bluff Redoubt
[*]Zacmac - Ally to the Glenmoril Witches
[*]Link - Falmer Servant guarding the Tower of Mzark in Blackreach
[*]Ammy - Forge slave at Silent Moons Camp
[*]Viral - Reclusive warrior in Valthume
[/list]
[b]Summons:[/b]
[list]
[*]Charles Wingate - Overpowered Warlord Colossus
[*]Tomoko - Witch
[*]Flamdini's Ghost - Ghost of the warlock in Skuldafn
[/list]
Where to get the tomes:
Kill Flamingdinner in Forelhost to loot the Conjure Charles Wingate tome
Kill Sharon Starkey in Serpents Bluff to get the Conjure Tomoko tome
Kill Flamdini in Skuldafn to get the tome to conjure him.
author: Mac B
